alert.note: Alert for Edgecombe; Halifax; Nash (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 11:41AM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Nash, northern Edgecombe and Halifax Counties through 1215 PM EDT... At 1140 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Roanoke Rapids to 12 miles southwest of Halifax to Dortches. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rocky Mount, Roanoke Rapids, Halifax, Scotland Neck, Dortches, Enfield, Weldon, Whitakers, Hobgood and Leggett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EDT for central North Carolina.
